Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen or top-rated tech to give your smart home an upgrade, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a  very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Below, you'll find our top Amazon deals right now, including one of our favorite TVs, an easy-to-use shovel and a durable kitchen tool, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. If you're looking for N95 and KN95 masks this winter, Amazon also has plenty of choices on sale right now.

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

The best Amazon deals of the day

1. 25% off: This ergonomic snow shovel

If you've got a storm headed your way, it's smart to add this telescoping shovel to your arsenal, on sale at Amazon today. Typically listed for $39.99, this 20-inch outdoor tool is available at 25% off for $29.99. Snow Joe says its shovel comes with an ergonomic D-ring handle with a spring assist that lets you simply fling heavy loads of snow from the shovel without throwing your back out. It also features an impact-resistant blade at its front to keep it lasting through the toughest conditions.

Get the Snow Joe SJ-SHLV20 20-Inch Back-Saving Telescoping Snow Shovel for $29.99 (Save $10)

2. Less than $30: One of our favorite heating pads

Typically priced at $34.99, this PureRelief XL heating pad is only $27.99 after clipping the $7 on-page coupon. We named the PureRelief XL as one of the best heating pads for being a "great, no-frills heating pad" with cozy microplush fabric and easy-to-use controls. Its electric cord is also detachable, making the pad easy to store and throw into the washing machine. 

Get the Pure Enrichment PureRelief XL Electric Heating Pad for $27.99 with coupon (Save $12)

3. 18% off: One of our favorite TVs

If you want to upgrade your screen to watch this year's Super Bowl, the Sony A90J Bravia XR OLED TV just might be the TV you're looking for. Typically listed from $2,799.99, this 4K smart TV is on sale in its 55-, 65- and 83-inch sizes starting as low as $2,298. The A90J is one of the best TVs we've tested thanks to its blending of picture-perfect black levels and some of the brightest highlights we've ever seen. Its smart Google TV platform is also speedy and flexible enough to suit experienced users and newcomers alike.

Get the Sony A90J Bravia XR OLED 4K Ultra HD Smart Google TV from $2,298 (Save $501.99 to $2,001.99)

4. Less than $3: These durable pan cleaners

Get the toughest scraps off your cast iron cookware with this pair of Lodge pan scrapers. Normally priced at $4.50, this two-pack of polycarbonate cleaning tools can now be yours for 34% off at $2.99. Lodge says its scrapers have corners specifically designed to get the hardest crisps of post-cooking debris off pots and pans.

Get the Lodge Pan Scrapers Two-Pack for $2.99 (Save $1.51)

5. 14% off: Our favorite smartwatch

When it comes to smartwatches, we found the Apple Watch Series 7 to be the best of its kind. When we tested it, we were impressed with how fast its battery charged and its many fitness tracking abilities, including the way it automatically detects cycling workouts. The Series 7 also has a larger display than its predecessors, making more room for a new watch-friendly keyboard and for an easier time reading text messages or GPS directions. Normally listed from $429, you can get Apple's latest smartwatch for as low as $369.98 in its 45-millimeter size with GPS capabilities.

Get the Apple Watch Series 7 45mm from $369.98 (Save $50 to $59.02)

The best Amazon deals from this week

1. InfinitiPro By Conair 3-in-1 Ceramic Styler 

Reduce frizz and add shine to your hair with the InfinitiPro by Conair 3-in-1 ceramic styler. Normally priced at $34.99, this handy hair styling tool can be yours for $19.99, or 43% off. Conair says the styler has three heat settings and two speed settings for you to find the right mode to detangle, straighten and volumize your locks. It also comes with three attachments for different styling options.

Get the InfinitiPro by Conair 1875 Watt 3-in-1 Ceramic Styler from $19.99 (Save $5 to $15)

2. Costa Farms Aloe Vera White-Natural Live Indoor Plant

If you're shopping for a Valentine's Day gift this year, bring some nature into the homes of your loved ones with the Costa Farms aloe vera indoor plant. Typically listed for $20.99, this seven-inch greenery is now 38% off, or $13.01. Costa Farms says the plant comes in a four-inch diameter décor pot and can help purify the air.

Get the Costa Farms 7-Inch Aloe Vera White-Natural Décor Planter for $13.01 (Save $7.98)

3. InvoSpa Shiatsu Electric Massager

Relax anytime you want with the InvoSpa Shiatsu electric body massager, on sale for more than half off. Normally priced at $70, you can get the device in blue with a travel bag for $49.97. InvoSpa says the massager can be positioned on your neck, shoulders and upper and lower back to relieve sore muscles using infrared heat. It also comes with a wall power adapter and car charger to use at home or on the road. 

Get the InvoSpa Shiatsu Electric Full Body Massager from $49.97 (Save $20.03)

4. KitchenAid Classic Multifunction Can Opener/Bottle Opener

Never struggle with a can of soup again with the KitchenAid Classic can opener, which can be yours for less than $15 right now. Typically listed for $15.68, you can get this kitchen essential in Hot Sauce red for just $13.55. KitchenAid says the opener features a stainless steel blade and an easy-turn knob for the simplest possible experience. It also has a convenient bottle opener at its top to pop open a beverage while you cook.

Get the KitchenAid Classic Multifunction Can Opener/Bottle Opener from $13.55 (Save $0.95 to $6.15)

5. Schwinn IC4 Indoor Cycling Bike

Skip the gym this year by bringing high-quality fitness into your home with this Schwinn IC4 indoor exercise bike. Typically priced at $1,199, this fitness cycle is now available for $798.98 thanks to a $400.02 price cut. We named the IC4 the best basic exercise bike for its quiet flywheel and pedals, as well as its accompanying accessories, which include a pair of three-pound dumbbells, a Bluetooth heart-rate monitor and a USB charging station for your smartphones or tablets. We found it to be easy to set up at home and appreciated the Bluetooth connectivity that lets you stream workouts and sessions from workout apps to your tablet or phone on the bike.

Get the Schwinn Fitness IC4 Indoor Cycling Exercise Bike for $799.98 with coupon (Save $400.02)
